DOC.brief_summary: To determine if a combination of three currently approved acne products are safe and effective for the treatment of moderate to severe acne
DOC.brief_title: Combination Treatment for Moderate to Severe Acne
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase IV, Open-Label Study Evaluating the treatment for Combination Acne Therapy.
